definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: breaking in, burglary—[[יִמָּחֵא הַגַּנׇּב]] ´[[אִם־בַּמּ]] Ex 22:l i.e. caught in the act (JE); so [[מְחָאתִים]] ´[[לאׁ בַּמּ]] Je 2:34, not in the act of breaking in didst thou find them (2 fs. sf. Ges:§ 44, 2, R 4), i.e. those whom thou hast slain were not detected in crime.
